Now is the perfect time to make one!Here are 5 Bitcoin Hourglass 1oz Fine Silver Coin! there will be 1 block per coin! 1 winner per block!the serial numbers will be random! each lot will come with a PEPE Patch!all coins come loaded!RULES- Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)- Requirements: Jr Member and up . Below Jr Member you can participate if you have a 1HoDLCLUB collectibles or Copper Membership- Last number of the hash of that block i choose will be the winner. [1 block per coin]- shipping fees : Paid by winner (times are hard )LIST:00 - sam0001 - heisty02 - bitbollo03 - Kazkaz2704 - kylecarbon05 - Frank AlpenCoin06 - Steeley07 - krogoth08 - Saxoshi09 - DirtyBirdE10 - KrispyKrypto11 - YodasRedRocket12 - Abiky13 - 2stout14 - Suzuki Matt15 - DebitMe16 - Orly5717 - ithd118 - mx12.levins19 - Danydee20 - Mitchell21 - The_Crypto_Kid22 - tread9323 - Otillio1330 24 - slimzak25 - Humble Bitcoiners26 - PawGo27 - Remsjack28 - Pmalek29 - hZti30 - bestcoin_5931 - TxCryptoKid32 - Jambo USA33 - Eclipse3334 - Boristhecat35 - 5tift36 - -doubleU-37 - Dernoste38 - Dustin westerbeck39 - Mbitr40 - 1miau41 - tweetious42 - ragilab43 - cygan44 - BobbyCoins45 - CARIBBEAN_TREASURES46 - HeRetiK47 - Bullion-n-BTC48 - Liquidoptions49 - henkcryptotank50 - minerjones 51 - Ratimov52 - aoluain53 - bullrun2020bro54 - digicoinuser55 - Hookzup156 - Becassine57 - Streissi58 - PeakDK59 - PreciousMetapsICT60 - xSlyy61 - geophphreigh62 - BTCOVERFIATS63 - bitcoiner24h64 - Est201365 - Darker4566 - Real-Duke67 - TheBeardedBaby68 - examplens69 - SwissCrab70 - doblezero71 - Markzellers72 - NeuroticFish73 - bct_ail74 - willi997475 - Spokanistan5176 - MoparMiningLLC77 - Brlgold77778 - Cryptogreatdane79 - Fattcatt80 - Buchi-8881 - CoinageMint82 - tldr-hodl83 - haloxon84 - Koal-8485 - Crytocanuk86 - johhnyUA87 - Mpamaegbu88 - xyz89 - mortare90 - mole081591 - koutakou92 - Kryptowerk93 - lebnor94 - ZipReg95 - sunnybwoy96 - turbodogma97 - GazetaBitcoin98 - Gatorelf99 - JanEmilGood luck to Everybody !
